name: virtual-thing
description: Creates and deploys a virtual thing based on its TD
author: Hassib Belhaj <https://github.com/hasbel>

scripts.clean: rm -rf thingweb.node-wot && rm -rf node-modules && rm -rf package-lock.json
scripts.preinstall: npm run clean && git clone https://github.com/hasbel/thingweb.node-wot && cd thingweb.node-wot && npm install && npm run build
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run start
